name: Cheat Or Die (itch)
description:
As a team of 2, we introduce you our game for this Jam : Cheat or Die !

As a united class, you have to help Mathilde to get a good grade to her exam without getting caught by the Supervisor !

Don’t get caught, be smart, and most of all… Have fun !

Jam theme :

KEEP IT ALIVE

Team members :

  • Kanonix - DEV, SOUND, GD
  • Sofy35 - GAME ARTIST
